divs: sighting detailsi was sat at the back of my mums house, it was about 12 am, i had been seeing odd things in the sky over the last few night, like a flash lite beam in the clouds. this two was in the north. well from behind this tree that was close to me, i could see a very very very bright lite, it looked like a planes head light, but it was to big and to low and was coming from behind the tree, over the tree. it looked like it was about to explode. when it came from behind the tree\over the tree, it was huge, but just a lite no the less (it was not a chinese lantern) it appeared to slow down, then change direction, it was heading towards me...it was like it had spotted me, and was in direct communication with me, at this point i was thinking, oh my god, it cant be..is that a ufo?...but before i could even finish thinking that, my question was answered, as to what it was, and to are we alone ....with out warning it dropped like a stone, then with out slowing down, it came to a dead stop, then went back up on itself...by this time i was freaking out a little, and my heart was pounding, as i felt scared, vulnerable, and like every thing around me was on pause. i reached in my pocket and pulled out a camera that has a video recorder to it type thing....i thought i will film it....so i started to film it....as proof i was not dreaming it...then another one just appeared.... (the reason i had the camera on me, was because i some how knew i would see 2 that night, i even told my friend i would get two ufo's on video)...then both just faded away.but as they moved, they seemed to be stuttering along, and wobbling. i thought they must be some secret thing we are developing (well the us, or england stole it from you) as the pilots of them were shit, i thought they cant be aliens flying them, as it does not look like the pilots inside them no how to fly them, they were not very good pilots, who ever they were. the video does not do them justice, they were a million times brighter than in the video, they were a hell of a lot bigger, and they were more white than red. but i do for some reason thing that i looked directly up, and all the sky was red???? and it was a perfectly clear night sky. the video is of what i had taken, they were not balloons, chinese lanterns or any other kind of aircraft, i know what i saw, and it shit me up! i thought i would be ok, and cool to see some thing like this, trust me, when it happens, it ***** you up. yes i was shouting as loud as i could, and sounding like a dick (i was scared) but for some reason, i got the feeling that they meant me no harm at all, and that they were looking out for me???? anyway, if they are alien craft, we would not stand a chance if they became hostile, no military on this planet could defeat them.
